title: Looking for a support player for a team.
body:
Looking for a support that would like to be part of a team. Our team doesn't practice/scrim often, but we play matches in a league every Saturday and Sunday around 4 pm pacific time. 
Only really taking plat+ some exceptions may be made. 

Just reply with IGN if interested. 
- I'll add you if considering picking you up as support.
Thanks

replies.body:
if you really cant find someone I can play Im a ad main i had gold 1 mmr and was gold 3 on my acc Luckyshot42 
Im looking for a team to play with and if you need someone i can join i main ad so wouldst be too hard of a transition  
Ign: Plzbuffmarksman
